description:
Registration is open from October 28 until November 14, 2014.
Economics studies how we allocate resources, which are limited, to satisfy wants and needs, which are unlimited. In fact, the existence of limited resources and unlimited way of using those resources is called the economic problem. This Macoreconomics CLEP Prep course includes rich content, discussions and quizzes to help prepare learners to successfully take the College Board Principles of Macroeconomics CLEP. The CLEP covers Macroeconomics content which is typically covered in an undergraduate semester course of Macroeconomics
title: eCore Macroeconomics
